data.title: Ryder Jobs and Careers
data.meta_description: There’s never been a better time to work at Ryder. We are committed to hiring extraordinary people and engaging them with challenging and rewarding opportunities.
data.text:
Our Marketing and Communications experts are some of the most creative, hard-working individuals in the business. So whether your passion is building unique and creative content, planning events and sponsorships, or innovating ways to support our sales force, if you’re looking for the opportunity to create great work and grow your career, there is a spot for you.

Tackling everything from compliance analysis to safety investigations, our Legal and Safety team is second to none. The work is as challenging as it is rewarding, and with the opportunity to specialize in compliance analysis or safety administration, every job you do builds a specific skill set and gets you closer to becoming an expert in your field.

The DevOps professional will be responsible for building, implementing and operationalizing DevOps practices, processes and tool chain across the whole organization.

We are looking for DevOps professionals with Azure & subscription management experience. Work side by side with the enterprise agile delivery team to scale DevOps practice across the organization. Influence and support the organizations DevOps strategy and roadmap. Lead the efforts on leveraging Cloud computing and services to automate the process of building, managing and provisioning through code. Work with operations team to scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation. Lead a team and collaborate with other IT and business teams to grow and evolve DevOps practices at Ryder.

The Application Development Lead is a technical expert who provides leadership in the design, development and delivery of technology enabled applications, products and services within a computing systems environment.

We are looking for Application Development Leads with 5 years of experience in any of the following areas of expertise: MS .NET/Azure Cloud Computing, Xamarin / C# for Mobile Development, MS SQL Server, SalesForce, Appian, IBM AS/400. Technical leads provide solutions to technical issues and are responsible for meeting development schedules and ensuring the delivered solution meets the technical specifications and design requirements.

The ServiceNow Leader provides technical expertise, and oversight to a team of ITOM developers, analysts and operations engineers to ensure timely execution of team and project results. This position works closely with various partners to provide guidance in the management of CIs and the relationships between them. In addition, this role provides leadership to ServiceNow CMDB and Discovery functions in the areas of design, development, documentation, testing, and modification of existing and new ITOM & CMDB capabilities, discovery, patterns and sensors, championing standard techniques, procedures, and criteria. Participate in architecture design, performance monitoring, module evaluation, and buy versus build decisions. Supervise and communicate development project status, dependencies, and risks and mitigation strategies to the project team, business stakeholders and leadership. Provides technical expertise to the business.

It is expected that this leader has strong expertise in multiple IT Operations disciplines and can collaborate and influence staff, peers and Sr. Leadership within IT to construct high quality, scalable, and efficient Enterprise Solutions. Passion and experience building teams and transforming ITSM operations is critical to be successful in this role.

Our BPM Architects innovate the way we do business. As an expert in digital applications, you’ll apply your technical expertise to managing our existing applications, as well as brainstorming and developing new ones. If you’re looking to innovate technology in a friendly, supportive work environment, you’ll fit right in at Ryder.

At Ryder, we understand the value skilled veterans bring to our team. We've built our reputation on some ideas that you'll recognize. Character. Judgment. Relationships. Results. If you share our commitment to deliver personalized service at the highest level, find out what our principled way of doing business can mean for your career.

The 8-week Summer Internship program offers students an opportunity to apply the knowledge and skills that they have gained to date in their studies. Project work and enrichment activities provide an understanding of different professional opportunities within our organization. This is not just an internship - it is an opportunity to build your professional network and explore future career opportunities at Ryder.
